description: Create a project phase revenue item actual export
permissions: Admins can create exports. Non-admins can create only if they are authorized to create each referenced project phase revenue item (delegated create permission).
side_effects: Creates a project phase revenue item actual export, sets status to processing, and enqueues asynchronous formatting that generates file body/name/mime type and may update status to processed or failed.
validation_notes: organization-formatter is required and must reference an active organization formatter of type ProjectPhaseRevenueItemActualExportFormatter. project-phase-revenue-item-ids is required and must include at least one ID. All project phase revenue items must be in scope with the exporting organization (broker/branch or customer). revenue-date, if provided, must be YYYY-MM-DD.

flags.name: --project-phase-revenue-item-ids
flags.description: Project phase revenue item IDs (comma-separated or repeated) (required)
